name: Snake Charmer (M.S.T.O.P.)
description:
Survival of the Boopest

Show that you're not the most bashful snake out there in this cute low-res platform. Boop all your rivals! Don't get booped yourself! Maybe even flick your cute tongue at them too!

Controls
  • Left/Right Arrow - Move
  • Up Arrow - Jump
  • X - Boop 
  • C - Tongue Flick (stuns other snakes for a bit)
